summary: A cynical tattooed loser first loses his job as a janitor in a bar run by a dwarf, then loses his mind.
cast: Carla Anderson|Alan Apple|Robert Clayton|Robin Clayton|Elise Frieri|Mark Fucile|Julie Lynch|Elizabeth Lee Miller|David Sternberg|Chris Tsakis|Lora Zuckerman
director: Director: Chris Frieri (as Christopher C. Frieri)
title: The Stranger
